Package org.example.unogame.model.deck

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
org.example.unogame.model.deck.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the Uno deck, including creation, shuffling, and card drawing.

The deck is backed by a Stack and initialized from UnoEnum resources, creating Card instances for each enumerated asset.

Thread-safety

This class is not thread-safe. If accessed from multiple threads, clients must provide their own synchronization.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck() throws GameException
      Creates a new deck and fully initializes it from UnoEnum values. The deck is shuffled after creation.
      Throws:
      GameException - if any card resource cannot be created or validated

  • Method Details

    • getCardValue

      public static String getCardValue(String name)
      Derives the logical Uno value from an enum constant name.
      Parameters:
      name - enum constant name (e.g., "GREEN_7", "SKIP_RED", "FOUR_WILD_DRAW")
      Returns:
      the card value (e.g., "7", "SKIP", "+4", "WILD"), or null if not recognized

    • getCardColor

      public static String getCardColor(String name)
      Derives the Uno color from an enum constant name.
      Parameters:
      name - enum constant name
      Returns:
      one of "GREEN", "YELLOW", "BLUE", "RED", "BLACK" (for wild cards), or null if unknown

    • takeCard

      public Card takeCard() throws GameException.OutOfCardsInDeck
      Removes and returns the top card from the deck.
      Returns:
      the top Card
      Throws:
      GameException.OutOfCardsInDeck - if the deck is empty

    • reloadFrom

      public void reloadFrom(List<Card> cards)
      Reloads the deck from a list of cards (e.g., recycled discards) and shuffles it. If the argument is null or empty, the method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      cards - a list of cards to push back into the deck

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Indicates whether the deck has no cards left.
      Returns:
      true if there are no cards in the deck; false otherwise
